examples.full_description: LinkedList#reverse! with an empty list keeps the head as nil
LinkedList#reverse! with an empty list keeps the tail as nil
LinkedList#reverse! with one node in the list keeps the head the same
LinkedList#reverse! with one node in the list keeps the tail the same

examples.description: does not update the node's prev_node or next_node attributes
examples.full_description: LinkedList#reverse! with one node in the list does not update the node's prev_node or next_node attributes

examples.description: updates the head of the list to be the old tail
examples.full_description: LinkedList#reverse! with multiple nodes in the list updates the head of the list to be the old tail

examples.description: updates the tail of the list to be the old head
examples.full_description: LinkedList#reverse! with multiple nodes in the list updates the tail of the list to be the old head

examples.description: updates the prev_node and next_node attributes of each node
examples.full_description: LinkedList#reverse! with multiple nodes in the list updates the prev_node and next_node attributes of each node
